pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generate Compilation Database for Use with 'Clang' Tools // Many modern C/C++ development tools in the 'clang' toolchain, such as 'clang-tidy' or 'clangd', rely on the presence of a compilation database in JSON format https://clang.llvm.org/docs/JSONCompilationDatabase.html. This package temporarily injects additional build flags into the R build process to generate such a compilation database.
